article.title: TCS Receives $14.9 Million World-Wide Satellite Systems Order From Army
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: TeleCommunication Systems Incorporated (TCS) has received a $14.9 million contract order from the U.S. Army to provide Transportable Ground Receive Suites and related spare parts to support the Global Broadcast Service. This award was made under the Army's $5 billion World-Wide Satellite Systems indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract vehicle in support of the program manager for the Warfighter Information Network - Tactical.
